hero.title: Comprehensive Packaging Solutions
hero.subtitle: Innovative packaging solutions designed to meet diverse industrial requirements with quality, efficiency, and reliability.
hero.description: From seaworthy wooden boxes to specialized industrial packaging, we provide end-to-end solutions for all your packaging needs.

categories.title: Wooden Packaging Solutions
categories.description: Professional wooden packaging solutions for heavy machinery, export, and industrial applications.

services.title: Seaworthy Wooden Box Packaging
services.description: Marine-grade wooden boxes designed for international shipping and harsh environmental conditions with ISPM-15 compliance and superior protection.

services.title: Wooden Crates
services.description: Versatile wooden crates for various industrial and commercial packaging applications with customizable designs and sizes.

services.title: Industrial Heavy Machinery Packaging Boxes
services.description: Heavy-duty wooden packaging specifically designed for large industrial machinery and equipment with reinforced construction.

services.title: Plywood Boxes Packaging
services.description: Lightweight yet strong plywood boxes for efficient packaging and shipping solutions with excellent strength-to-weight ratio.

services.title: Small Packaging Boxes
services.description: Compact and efficient small packaging boxes for lightweight items and consumer goods with versatile design options.

services.title: Pinewood Export Packaging
services.description: High-quality pinewood packaging solutions specifically designed for export applications with international compliance.

services.title: Rubber Wood Box Packaging
services.description: Sustainable rubber wood packaging solutions offering excellent strength and environmental benefits with eco-friendly properties.

categories.title: Wooden Pallets
categories.description: Comprehensive range of wooden pallets for material handling and storage applications.

services.title: Wooden Pallets
services.description: Standard wooden pallets for general material handling and storage applications with reliable construction.

services.title: Two-Way Wooden Pallets
services.description: Standard two-way entry pallets for forklift handling and storage applications with optimal access design.

services.title: Four-Way Wooden Pallets
services.description: Four-way entry pallets providing maximum accessibility for material handling equipment with versatile design.

services.title: Collar Wooden Pallets
services.description: Pallets with removable wooden collars for increased storage capacity and versatility in material handling.

services.title: Heavy-Duty Wooden Pallets (Jungle Wood & Hardwood)
services.description: Extra heavy-duty pallets made from premium jungle wood and hardwood for maximum load capacity and durability.

categories.title: Specialized Packaging Solutions
categories.description: Advanced packaging solutions for specific industrial requirements and applications.

services.title: Aluminum Foil Vacuum Packing
services.description: High-barrier aluminum foil vacuum packaging for moisture and corrosion protection with advanced sealing technology.

services.title: VCI Packing (Volatile Corrosion Inhibitors)
services.description: Advanced VCI packaging technology for superior corrosion protection of metal components with innovative chemical protection.

services.title: Lashing and Choking Packaging
services.description: Professional cargo securing solutions for safe transportation of heavy and oversized loads with certified restraint systems.

categories.title: Treatment & Custom Services
categories.description: Specialized treatment services and custom packaging solutions for specific requirements.

services.title: ISPM-15 Heat Treatment
services.description: Certified heat treatment services for wooden packaging materials as per international standards with official certification.

services.title: ISPM-15 Fumigation Treatment
services.description: Professional fumigation treatment services for wooden packaging materials and cargo with certified chemical treatment.

services.title: Transforming Wooden Pallets into Furniture
services.description: Creative upcycling services to transform used wooden pallets into functional furniture pieces with sustainable design.

services.title: Custom Customer Specific Material Packing
services.description: Tailored packaging solutions designed specifically for unique customer requirements and materials with bespoke design.

services.title: Palletization
services.description: Professional palletization services for efficient loading, storage, and transportation of goods with optimized arrangements.

services.title: Packing Materials
services.description: Comprehensive range of packing materials including cushioning, protective, and securing materials for complete packaging solutions.

features.title: Custom Design
features.description: Tailored packaging solutions designed specifically for your products and requirements.

features.title: Quality Assured
features.description: All products tested and certified to meet international quality and safety standards.

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: Efficient production and logistics ensure timely delivery of your packaging orders.

features.title: Technical Support
features.description: Expert consultation and technical support throughout your packaging journey.
